key.description: The config key; up to 100 characters.

value.description: The config value; up to 4096 characters.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Config.

key.description: The secret key; up to 100 characters.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Secret.

sid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies this App.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

unique_name.description: A developer-defined string that uniquely identifies the App. This value must be unique for all Apps on this Account. The `unique_name` value may be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the resource.

date_created.description: The date that this App was created, given in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date that this App was last updated, given in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

app_sid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies this App.

url.description: The absolute URL of this Manifest.

sid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies this Device.

unique_name.description: A developer-defined string that uniquely identifies the Device. This value must be unique for all Devices on this Account. The `unique_name` value may be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the resource.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

app.description: Information about the target App and the App reported by this Device. Contains the properties `target_sid`, `date_targeted`, `update_status` (one of `up-to-date`, `pending` and `error`), `update_error_code`, `reported_sid` and `date_reported`.

logging.description: Object specifying whether application logging is enabled for this Device. Contains the properties `enabled` and `date_expires`.

date_created.description: The date that this Device was created, given in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Device was last updated, given in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

links.description: The absolute URLs of related resources.

device_sid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies the parent Device.

key.description: The config key; up to 100 characters.

value.description: The config value; up to 4096 characters.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Config.

device_sid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies the parent Device.

key.description: The secret key; up to 100 characters.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Secret.

info.title: Twilio - Microvisor
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Configs for an Account.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

UniqueName.description: A unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Device by the developer. It may be used in place of the Device SID.

TargetApp.description: The SID or unique name of the App to be targeted to the Device.

LoggingEnabled.description: A Boolean flag specifying whether to enable application logging. Logs will be enabled or extended for 24 hours.

RestartApp.description: Set to true to restart the App running on the Device.
